newsitem.title: USA: Bitstream Inc to buy software firm.
newsitem.headline: Bitstream Inc to buy software firm.

text.p: Bitstream Inc on Tuesday said it has signed a letter of intent to acquire Archetype Inc for an undisclosed amount of cash and stock.
The acquisition would be accomplished by the merger of Archetype into newly formed subsidiary of Bitstream, that would continue to operate under the Archetype name.
Completion of the acquisition is planned to coincide with the end of the first calendar quarter of 1997, Bitstream said.
However, consummation of the acquisition is subject to a number of conditions, including the execution of a definitive merger agreement and the approval of the merger by Archetype's stock holders.
Archetype, based in Burlington, Massachusetts, develops and markets server-based information management software for the graphic arts industry.
